INKCAZELO:

ICandelo loMlawuli woPhuhliso loRhulumente weeNgingqi onceda oomasipala ekwenzeni ulungiselelo namacebo okulwa imililo.Oku kuquka iinkqubo ezihlanganisiweyo zamacandelo ngamacandelo, kwaneenkqubo ezahlukeneyo zoqeqesho lokucwangcisa kwanokuphumeza amanyathelo ajonge:
* Ukuthintela okanye ukunciphisa ukuba semngciphekweni wentlekele.
* Ukudambisa ubukhali okanye iziphumo zentlekele.
* Ukulungiselela izinto ezingxamisekileyo.
* Ukusabela msinya nangokufanelekileyo kwizihlo zentlekele.
* Ukunceda ezkubuyiseleni kwimo yesiqhelo emva kwentlekele.
